website_summaries.verdict: Safely take your dog on bike rides with a design that takes account both laws of physics and dog behavior.
pros: Patented mast prevents bike from tipping when dog pulls
Trains dog to stay in heel position
Can be installed on either side of most bikes
Leash comes with bonus collapsible water or food travel pet bowl
cons: May not be good for heavier and less active dogs or those dogs who aren't used to excessive exercising
Could use a quick release  attachment

customer_reviews.title: Keeping safe while having FUN
customer_reviews.text: This was a higher priced bike leash, but so worth the cost. My dog is 70lbs and has DNA herder within. On one of our first outings with the new leash she bolted out from the side of the bike at a passing car. It was easy to maintain control keeping both of us safe. My dog and I are having a lot of fun with her running along side the bike. Such great exercise. High recommend here. So well made, easy install. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: That girl

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog (and my husband) loves this so much! She does really well on it and it does a much better job of getting her energy out than we ever could running her. She was already leash trained really well so the transition to this was seamless. It attaches so low to the bike that even if she did try to get away she couldn't pull the bike over. Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Turner

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described
customer_reviews.text: This bike tow leash is a great product. Very easy to attach to your bike. My dog took to it immediately and it keeps her a safe distance away from the bike and is easy to control. As an added bonus I received a collapsible dog bowl for watering your pet. Also a great product, and after using the tow leash your pet will be ready to drink. Very happy with my purchase>
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This truly is the best and safest bike tow leash for exercising your dog
customer_reviews.text: This truly is the best and safest bike tow leash for exercising your dog!! I tried unsafely and unsuccessfully to just hold on to my 50 lb fur baby's leash as I rode my bike. Things would go well until she suddenly decided to change directions... I had 3 pretty significant spills on my bike before deciding no more. I bought this and we enjoyed it so much, I bought another for my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey but we'll worth it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my 90 lb Lab. Firat time he's ever walked/run with a bike and he immediately was a pro. Went 3 miles first time out.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I could take my dog with me while bike riding and she took right to it, loves going for a run with me, very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to run my GSP. Works fab. The only thing is he attaches to left side of bike. Right would have been better - however having him on the left away from the ditch is a good idea. Highly recommend for active dogs. LOVE IT. (The free folding water bowl is a nice touch. We use it every time we go out).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a quick release attachment
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very critical purchaser, and my dog is an extremely strong puller. I did not believe it would live up to the price. It did. Although it doesn't speak to the quality of the item, I would recommend a quick release attachment, similar to a bicycle tire quick release, rather that the two finger tightened bolts. That said, I have had no problem with the finger tightened bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenience of the Bike Tow Leash
customer_reviews.text: The Bike Tow Leash Is easy to mount on your bicycle, and it makes it safe and convenient to ride your bike while walking your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: We have a husky and he has never been around bikes but we bought this and he loves it. He gets excited to go for a run and this product makes it easy to take him. Easy to take on and off the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Schlueter

customer_reviews.title: My take time to train dog to go on it
customer_reviews.text: This product was very well-made. Easy to assemble. It did take time to train my dog to go on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach and well designed. Our dogs began to run with bike tow leash in seconds. A bit pricey compared to other products, so we're hoping it's built to last.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews for this item and the competitors, I realized a few extra dollars for this is better than paying vetenary and/or medical bills. I didn't want something that could break away if a squirrel or cat ran out infont of her along the road. We live in a rural area and there are not any parks or cycling trails sufficient for her to get a good workout. I have a husky with endless energy. She needs to be exercised/ran daily, or she gets into mischief.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

product_meta.title: Bike Tow Leash - Stable and Safe Bike Dog Leash - Medium to Large Dogs Bundled with eOutletDeals Collapsible Pet Water/Food Travel Bowl
product_meta.description:
Color:RedBest Bike Dog Leash - Bike Tow Leash - Stable and Safe - Medium to Large Dogs Bundled with eOutletDeals Collapsible Pet Water / Food Travel Bowl 

 Description: 

 Bike Tow Leash let's you safely take your dog on bike rides with a design that takes into account both the laws of physics and dog behavior. 
The dog's ability to pull to the side is greatly reduced and the tipping forces are virtually eliminated. 
It is also easy to install and extremely stable. Even if your dog stops to potty suddenly, you will not be knocked over! 
If your dog wants to go faster than you can pedal, you can allow him to propel your bike. 
The Bike Tow Leash's unique patented mast prevents the bike from tipping when the dog pulls, reduces any jolts and gently trains your dog to stay in heel position. 
The Bike Tow Leash installs and removes in about a minute without tools. Move it from bicycle to bicycle or simply clip it to the back of your seat out of the way when riding without your dog. 

Contents

** Free eOutletDeals Collapsible Pet Water / Food Travel Bowl. 
** 1 x Pre-Assembled Bike Tow Leash. 
** 1 x 1 x Universal Mounting Clamp. 
** 1 x Installation Instructions 
** 1 x Unique Conversation Starter. 
** Years of Enjoyment!
feature_bullets: The Bike Tow Leash is best suited for medium to large dogs. Some heavier or less active breeds, such as bulldogs, may have difficulty with excessive exercise.
Safely take your dog on bike rides with a design that takes into account both the laws of physics and dog behavior.
The Bike Tow Leash universal clamp will fit either side of most bikes.
Allows the dog to get fully behind the bike to avoide obstacles.
Made in the USA. American Pet Association 5 star safety approved for safely riding with your dog
